H0.text: Ice melts into water is a case in which a physical change occurs.

H1.text: Bread burns in a toaster is a case in which a physical change occurs.

H2.text: A cake baking in an oven is a case in which a physical change occurs.

H3.text: Two chemicals forming a new substance is a case in which a physical change occurs.

A4.text: Melting is a physical change that does not alter the chemical composition of the substance.

A5.text: The formation of new substances is a chemical change, not a physical change.
